content: Stamina is required to complete combos, sprint, and jump in Black Myth: Wukong. It is quite an essential skill, so having something that boosts your Stamina recovery is very helpful.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Swift_Bat_Spirit.md', within the main section titled 'Swift Bat Spirit', specifically from the subsection 'Swift Bat Spirit'.
The content is as follows:
Stamina is required to complete combos, sprint, and jump in Black Myth: Wukong. It is quite an essential skill, so having something that boosts your Stamina recovery is very helpful.
